meanings.definition: A type of metamorphic rock formed from the alteration of pre-existing rock under high temperature and pressure.
meanings.sent1: The gneisses in the mountains have unique patterns due to their formation process.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study gneisses to understand how rocks change under extreme conditions.
meanings.sent3: The gneisses at the quarry decided to throw a rock party to celebrate their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: The strength of the gneisses is a testament to the power of nature's sculpting hands.
meanings.sent5: The gneisses shimmered in the sunlight, revealing their hidden beauty.
